title: tudi shei manamE
sahitya:
tudi shei manamE shrI hariyaip-paNindu tudi shei manamE


anupallavi

  kadiroLi pOl vandu idayaviruL pOkkum patita pAvanan padAmbujam ninandu nI


caraNam    Adi mUlamena OlamiTTa karikkabhayam tandu rakSitta paramanai
 AlamuNDa aranum ayanum pugazh shIlanai AlilaimEl paLLikoNDa bhuvana patiyai
